data.message: HATE the update, no hate isn't strong enough.... LOATHE WITH EVERY FIBER OF MY BODY!!! yes that's much better.

replies.message: if it WORKS don't BREAK it.....duh?!?!?!
then don't use it guys!  no one  is making you use facebook
Actually I have a business that uses facebook to sell... so I do have to use it...
and my 1000+ buyers need easy access with minimal extra charges..... so yes I have to use it for their sake if not mine

well you asked, and based on the response....... we all hate it.  Now lets see if you care enough to listen and change it back.  I hate the fact that you have chosen which of my friends to show on my newsfeed and which ones not to show.  How do you know who to choose?

I want to be able to see ALLL of my friends comments etc  not just the same person/group  everyday.  HATE the updated version.  Stop changing it so much and leave it alone  Now put it back to the older version on desktops, ipad, iphones, etc.
well i think it ok and if you don'don't like it you don't have to read it
